name: Streamsx.stargate
tagline: Streams tools for  interacting with HBase via Stargate
body:
### Streamsx.stargate for HBase on Bluemix
This toolkit is for interacting with HBase via the REST API.  It was built to target [IBM's Bluemix](https://console.ng.bluemix.net/), which requires that HBase access be via the Knox gateway.  

The [streamsx.hbase](https://github.com/IBMStreams/streamsx.hbase) cannot be used in that scenario.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
